title: Groth Vineyards Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, September 3, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a special tasting with the acclaimed Groth Vineyards of Napa Valley. This event features just three standout wines, highlighting Groth’s precision and craftsmanship in Cabernet Sauvignon, Chardonnay, and Sauvignon Blanc.

Tasting Fee: $25 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Groth Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Herbal and refined with cherry, plum, dried herbs, and tobacco leaf over fine, grippy tannins.

• Groth Estate Chardonnay 2022 – Bright and layered with orange zest, pear, kiwi, lemon curd, and a touch of toasted hazelnut.

• Groth Napa Valley Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – Fresh and vibrant with mango, papaya, citrus peel, white tea, and a long, mineral-driven finish.

Experience the elegance of Groth’s Napa Valley portfolio—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
